title: Enhancing Organizational Development Competencies: Collaboration-Based Experiential Learning Projects for Database Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world data requirements of educational settings in teams of three and create an ERD (Entity-Relationship Diagram)
Learners can implement database structures (tables, relationships) and search interfaces (including CRUD functionality) using collaboration tools
Learners can document and present the prototype improvement process reflecting user feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
